theme.

I agree, a robot doesn't really belong in gladiator, although the "Throw
opponent" skill sounds neat, and perhaps the knock-back ability from a
close-combat hit can be given to another class?

> I also thought of a promotion.  A druid could become a
> Sorceror sometime that could summon special forest creatures like wolfs
and

although sorcerors are associated more with mages so perhaps a different
name is needed.
